title: eckobaba
author: eckobaba
content: I am a foreigner that needs a argentinian citizen or resident to make legitimate payments for digital products within Argentina, if you can make the services available, lets discuss over telegram @greenblaze.All deals go through legitimate BTCtalk escrow.hit me up if intrested..

comments.author: zestVI
comments.body: Try another forum there exists one where you can find someone much better.

comments.author: eckobaba
comments.body: can you please suggest such forum so i can check it out?Thanks
